attributes.action: call a vote of no confidence in Parliament for and on behalf of the citizens of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is due to the fact that we the people have no confidence in the majority of the present members of parliament, and do not have the believe that they can regain our confidence ever.due to the fact that too many have used and abused the citizens of this country with the belief that they are only accountable to us once every 4 to 5 years. we have to show that they are accountable at all times....not just election times

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
